message_1: Imagine you have to choose 4 different colored balls (red, blue, green, and yellow) out of a bag containing these 4 colors. What is the total number of ways you can choose the 4 balls (in any order)?
message_2: Since there are 4 different colored balls and you have to choose all 4 of them, there is only 1 way to choose the balls. This is because you must choose all the available colors, so the order in which you choose them does not matter.
